channel.title: Python on PrimerPy
channel.description: Recent content in Python on PrimerPy

item.title: Python Fundamentals
item.author: isaaczhou85@gmail.com (Isaac Zhou)
item.description: In this tutorial, we will learn all the basics to start with Python. Topics covered here includes data types, lists, loops, dictionary etc. We will also take a peek at some more advanced techniques such as list comprehension and dictionary comprehension. Although there are a number of libraries that can make a Pythonist's life even easier, have a solid foundation would be a key to understand and learn more advanced topics.
